name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Adaptive Learning
description: This is a repository of adaptive learning APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Knewton
apis.description: Students worldwide get personalized recommendations from the most advanced adaptive learning platform. Learn how Knewton can power your courses.

apis.name: OpenMinds
apis.description: OpenMinds is a learning platform that instantly transforms any content (your content or 3rd party content) into engaging learning apps. Your students play the apps on any platform to learn and master specific skills, such as vocabulary, spelling, grammar, punctuation and much more.
